name: Arancio Americano
description: Developed by legendary barman Dale DeGroff for the 2007 opening of Morandi in New York (this recipe comes from DeGroff's The Essential Cocktail), the Arancio Americano takes the bright bite of a classic Americano highball, and smooths it out with components of a brunchtime favorite, the Mimosa.

recipeInstructions.text: Fill a wine glass with ice and add vermouth, Campari and orange juice. Gently stir to combine; top with chilled prosecco.
